title: Beginner bots have runes now
body: So I've noticed beginner bots have runes, despite the fact that until this point they never had runes and masteries. Any major reason for this or were bots just too easy even for beginner players?

replies.body:
It's beginner bots, go pentakill 12 times in a single game.
What's the issue?

Probably a major reason for such a change would be the fact that Runes and Masteries went from such a vast and varied system (including 45 different Masteries, and hundreds of different Runes) to a much smaller selection of Runes (60 Runes evenly divided into 5 categories). With that change, it's clearly become a lot easier for people to start memorising what each rune does, and where they fit, as opposed to the old system where there's literally hundreds of options across the two systems. It probably also helps that pretty much everything (or even everything, I'm not sure) within the new Rune system has some clear visual aspect in-game, so you can actually figure out which Runes someone has without having to refer to external sources like op.gg
